Name: Mr. Healer
About the game: Become the greatest healer in all of the land! Gain levels, master various healing classes, find epic gear, recruit unique and powerful friends, and defeat devastating bosses as you progress through more challenging levels! Features 18 worlds and over 180 levels 9 playable classes each offering unique styles of healing Nearly 200 pieces of equipment to collect Recruit-able friends with unique talents and abilities Simple story line set in a fantasy world that unfolds throughout the game A difficult 'Hard Mode' for those seeking the ultimate healing challenge
